message: Hi, the best and quickest solution is to create a virtual image of ubuntu. It’s free and shouldn’t take more than 20 mins. We’re going to try and setup instructions on what to install, but you can also check our suggestions on our github tutorial at www.github.com/hoppertravel/hackreduce
Basically, you should run virtualization or cygwin for the event. We recommend doing this before the day of the event so as not to waste too much time on setup.
A wiki is now up which details a little more information for Windows users: https://github.com/hoppertravel/HackReduce/wiki/Windows-Users
